name: whodb
description: WhoDB is a next-generation, self-hostable database explorer with chat-style querying. It connects to Postgres, MySQL, SQLite, MongoDB, Redis and more, providing a modern interface for browsing schemas, running queries, and visualizing results.

features.title: Chat
features.description: Write queries using natural language or SQL with an intuitive chat interface

features.title: Data Visualization
features.description: View query results as tables, charts, or graphs for better data understanding

features.title: Connection Management
features.description: Save and manage multiple database connections with secure credential storage

features.title: Data Export
features.description: Export query results to CSV, JSON, or Excel formats for reporting or analysis
